The location was not great there are much prettier places in Malta

1: it is the perfect place where professionalism quality and elegance blend beautifully well together
A special thanks goes to the concierge Mario Bugeja he is always very helpful professional and filled with passion towards his work

One of my personal favorites touches was the touch screens you use to order the lift to you and which floor you wish to go to it then tells you which lift to use you jump in and it takes youMasive baths also and powerful shower
Excellent location great breakfast good rooms rude receptionists
Everything was as we expected from a 5 star hotel very good
I am an SPG gold member and we were upgraded to an amazing 2 room sea view suite on the 11th floor with exec floor access at check in
Good place to stay in Malta
I am more than satisfied of my overall experience definitely something to repeat
